meanings.definition: The state or quality of being lanky.
meanings.sent1: Her lankinesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: His lankinesses made him a natural choice for the basketball team.
meanings.sent3: The lankinesses of the scarecrow made the birds think it was a real person.
meanings.sent4: The lankinesses of the tree branches reached out like long, bony fingers.
meanings.sent5: The lankinesses of the model on the runway accentuated the elegant designs.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a thin and tall physique.
meanings.sent1: The lankinesses of the giraffe allowed it to reach the leaves on the tall tree.
meanings.sent2: Her lankinesses made her a great candidate for modeling.
meanings.sent3: The lankinesses of the lamp post made it look like a giant pencil.
meanings.sent4: The lankinesses of the skyscraper towered over the city like a thin giant.
meanings.sent5: The lankinesses of the beanstalk in the story made it seem magical and unreal.
